trans-unit.source: In the Azure Portal, click **Browse All**, click **Mobile Apps**, and then click the mobile app that you just created.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Portal, click **Browse All**, click **Mobile Apps**, and then click the mobile app that you just created.

trans-unit.source: In the **Related** section of the blade, click **Push notification services**, click **Google Cloud Messaging**, enter the **API Key** value that you obtained from GCM in the previous procedure, and then click the **Save** button.
trans-unit.target: In the **Related** section of the blade, click **Push notification services**, click **Google Cloud Messaging**, enter the **API Key** value that you obtained from GCM in the previous procedure, and then click the **Save** button.
